column4: i am trying out 2.6.11 to add support for my Soundblaster Live 24-bit.. which seems to have worked.. alsa runs on boot and i here the subwoofer kick in.. but now when .11 tries to run gnome.. it locks the puter up after logging in.  any ideas?
wtf... and there is no restricted-modules for 2.6.11?
you're probably more-or-less on your own with 2.6.11 (?)
